<h1>{{title}}</h1>

<p><strong>Authors:</strong> {{{author}}}</p>
<p><strong>Version:</strong> {{{version}}}</p>
<p><strong>License:</strong> {{{license}}}</p>

<h4>Description</h4>
<p>{{{description}}}</p>

{{#depends}}<h4>Depends</h4>
<p>{{{depends}}}</p>{{/depends}}

{{#imports}}<h4>Imports</h4>
<p>{{{imports}}}</p>{{/imports}}

{{#suggests}}<h4>Suggests</h4>
<p>{{{suggests}}}</p>{{/suggests}}

{{#enhances}}<h4>Enhances</h4>
<p>{{{enhances}}}</p>{{/enhances}}
